data.actual_result: The search box does not close if the click event is over the arrows pointing at the search box
data.expected_result: The search box should close after clicking outside of the box
data.short_description: Surrounding arrows void click event when escaping search box
data.steps_to_repro: - Create Discord account - Sign in to account - Hold CTRL and press K then release - Check for animated arrows surrounding search box (only shows for first few uses of search box) - Click on the arrows described
